Programs offered in College Station Apply to Texas A&M University at College Station McAllen, Texas One of our newest facilities is the Higher Education Center at McAllen, which opened in fall 2018. The center serves students in the Rio Grande Valley by providing access to top-tier academic programs close to home. Degree programs range from agricultural economics and engineering to public health and construction science. Programs offered in McAllen Apply to the
